thread.title: Sally at Fountain Crest Retirement Community
thread.title_full: Words Anywhere reviewed by Sally at Fountain Crest Retirement Community

author: Sally at Fountain Crest Retirement Community
title: Sally at Fountain Crest Retirement Community
text: Looks beautiful on our wall with our employee's pictures for our new employee recognition program. Lots of compliments already. Fast shipping too! Would highly recommend Words Anywhere and will buy from them again when we need more lettering! Thanks!
